Title: Lady's a Charm
Plot: After settling her family in Ren Mar, Nancy turns her attention back to business. Later, Guillermo gives her a much-needed crash course in "running" across the border. Meanwhile, Celia gets further acquainted with life in prison. Lenny leaves Silas and Shane to care for Bubbie while he goes to the track. When Lenny returns, Andy confronts him about some family history.
ParentalRatingReason: R18 Drug use and offensive language
GuestStars: Albert Brooks, Lisa Arch, Lydia Blanco, Enrique Castillo, JD Cullum, Alejandro Patino, Rigo Sanchez, Jack Stehlin, Ezra Buzzington, Eddie Martinez, Pamela Shaddock, Jo Farkas, Joe Gerety, Travis L. Denham
